it fits good and looks great

Product says heavyweight but when it came in, it felt like boohoo material and is almost super thin. Gonna be returning.

Great material runs a tad bit big but fits the baggy look  overall, i would definitely recommend if interested.
I like the fit of this hoodie & how comfy it is! It's the perfect oversized look, and it feels heavy/high quality.

I am obsessed with this sweatshirt! From the color, to the material, to the fit, everything is just perfect!  It's so comfortable and warm.  I'll be keeping an eye out for sales to get several more colors!  I'm 5'5", 217 lbs and ordered a medium and it's the perfect oversized fit.
Great quality. Matches the same hoodies at Abercrombie but for $30 less.
Even though the reviews were great, I still had my doubts but this sweatshirts is great quality. Super thick and warm. Well worth the money! Highly recommend!

My teen daughter asked for this for Christmas. I was reluctant to get it because it seemed expensive for such a basic hoodie, plus since it is distressed, a lot of people griped about the quality in the reviews that I read. But, I went ahead and got it because she said this was for sure the only one she wanted. I was very pleasantly surprised when it arrived. It is very nice quality and is so soft and thick. It is literally HEAVY. It does have distressing, but that is on purpose, so I don't understand why some people have a problem with it unless they didn't pay attention to the description. It is so nice that now I want one for myself. Highly recommend.
LOVE this hoodie!! The fabric is amazing and the fit is definitely oversized. I got a medium and it fits large.

I wanted a few months to write this review over all I love this hoodie because it’s thick comfy and that true over sized fit but… the hood comes to a point and I thought maybe after some wash/wear it would relax a little nope that point is still strong so I don’t love that about it
I was a bit skeptical at first seeing this come in a shrink wrapped bag. And then it was super wrinkly. But it washed nicely and it is a beautiful fabric and color. I have this now and two colors.

This sweatshirt is definitely very oversized and I could have gone down couple sizes, easily (it does NOT shrink in the wash). The fabric is thick, soft, and extremely cozy—I have basically been living in it since I purchased! I got it in green and it looks just like the photo. I will definitely be purchasing in more colors!

I'm 5'3, 110lb, and I ordered an xS. This hoodie sits right below my bum, and the sleeves are slightly longer than my wrists, which I like. It's extremely soft (inside and out) and warm; perfect for someone who only wants to wear a thin shirt or bra underneath. I've worn it quite a lot and it's still so so soft. I have lots of pets, so lots of pet hair. A lint roller takes all of the hair right off, super easy. The fabric doesn't eat and trap the hair. Highly recommend!
My 13 year-old son picked this out for Christmas and he loved it! It is so soft and cozy. I loved that the distressed pieces aren’t actually ripped. They just look a little bit more distressed

This hoodie is the best hoodie it’s so comfy and soft very fluffy and got me so many compliments al my friends wanted to borrow it and when wearing they also got compliments!! Buying in every color

My 15 yo wears a lot of hoodies and this is his favorite! It’s warm, durable, cool color and texture, and has a great hood. He has been wearing it for over a year and still in great shape.

This hoodie is great! Very hesitant at first because of the “oversized” description I ordered my normal size, and putting it on it was an actual oversized fit. No worries, I'll just steam it.

This hoodie is thick but comfy. A little oversized but so perfect. i wish they werent $50 a piece.. id have them in all colors! still has a little stretch since some material will not stretch for the life of me but this hoodie is the bees knees.. best hoodie i have ever owned
I like the thickness and warmth of the hoodie easy to put on great for winter ! , but a little pricey
Amazing quality, extremely soft and comfortable

The way I would explain this hoodie is like being in a cloud. It is oh so soft, more than you can imagine! The quality is top tier! I had previously ordered about 5 other vintage washed hoodies and I wish I could return them all and get them from FAIABLE! The distressing around the hood, cuffs and band is on point and made me love it even more! The color is absolutely gorgeous! I wore this the day I got it to our local parade and it was COLD and I didn’t feel the wind one bit! If you want a soft, warm all around amazing hoodie. BUY BUY BUY IT! You will not regret it!!!!!

This sweater is super comfortable and warm, but not overbearingly, which is great for layering. Personally I really enjoy the oversized look and overall fit thus the large was perfect for me. Definitely great value for money. I will be purchasing this item in every other color.

I wanted a worn-look, cozy sweatshirt and this is it! I wanted it very big so ordered a XXL because when I go for cozy I hate when the waist band is clingy. This size was perfect for what I was going for. At 5’4” and 170, I might have gotten the same look with XL as well, but I am happy with my order as is

I am a 5’4 male, i usually wear a size small and bought the navy blue small, but this fits more like a medium/large. this is already an oversized hoodie so i would size down one if you are looking for more of a true to size fit — although it will still run a little oversized so don’t worry about it being too small. 评论概述: Quality of fabric is different in the different colors
评论详情: I bought the bright blue a couple of months ago and absolutely love it! The fabric is soft and thick. I just recently bought the navy one this past week and the fabric is completely different. It’s thin and not as soft. You can even tell when looking at the stitching of the pockets. It’s totally different. I would still recommend them but take a moment to look at other reviews to see which colors have the better fabric.

I have been searching for a nice hoodie that is good material but not to thick and when I tell you this was exactly what I wanted I am not exaggerating. I usually don’t write reviews but I love this hoodie so much I had to let others know.

Super comfortable. Do not size up like you normally would for a sweatshirt. I’m 5’9 125lbs and athletic build and I normally get a medium in sweatshirts so they are a bit baggy but these sweatshirts are already oversize fit. I should have gotten a small but it’s still super cute.
Literally the best hoodie ever I would order in every color
If you’re big and think you need to size up, dont

This hoodie is so comfy and soft. I usually run as a small or extra small, but I got a medium because I like the oversized feel and look. It’s not boxy, it fits well, and it’s so easy to match with basics. I got the bright blue color and it’s so pretty. I recommend looking this product up on tik tok to see how the colors appear.

It’s SUCH a good sweatshirt but it’s so damn big. The one in the photo is a medium. Definitely worth it but it’s extra extra baggy, so I’d consider sizing down one or even two sizes (unless you want the extreme baggy look).

BUY IT! Since I bought the blue one I have already ordered the red and I cannot wait to order the other colors. It’s such good quality, tbh better the most hoodies I’ve ever bought and I’m a hoodie girl. Hoodie is hoodieing. The hood is big and comfy and the colors are vibrant. It’s not that expensive compared to most hoodies these days. It’s cozy and heavy, LOVE IT!!
Amazing quality as expected for a 60 dollar sweatshirt but very oversized. I wear a m usually but it fit like an ExL so I’m returning and getting a smaller size. Overall great product
Got this hoodie for college and absolutely love it, I got the black-wash it goes with everything!!! Definitely Worth
This hoodie might be the best hoodie I’ve ever owned. If you normally fit into a size S I would recommend sizing down to XS for a perfect fit.

Love this hoodie! I bought 4 different colors. I always come across the problem of the bottom elastic part being way too tight and I never wear them. I am also short so the sleeves are usually too long. But this hoodie is perfect! The bottom elastic part is not tight, and the sleeves are not too long. I am 5'8'' and 150 pounds and I got a medium. The fit is different with each color. For example, the brown fits perfect. The black is a little bigger and the sleeves are a little longer. And the green and blue are much bigger. They’re longer on the torso, sleeves, and just generally baggier.

This is definitely an oversized hoodie. It’s advertised as a men’s hoodie, so ladies, keep that in mind. I am 5’3” 118 lbs. I bought the size sm, & it’s big. But that is what I wanted. It hangs just under my bum & is big through the arms & chest. It’s very very thick, warm & bulky. Everything that I wanted it to be. I love it & if it wasn’t so expensive I would definitely order another one. I still might. So if you want oversized, thick & bulky, this is for you, if you want it to be more form fitting & thin, it’s NOT for you. Would look really cute with a pair of leggings or skinny jeans. It’s a keeper!
Feels very high quality and fits comfortably. Color is nice, just wish it was 100% cotton
The sweatshirt is great, fabric, size and shape. Washes well, no shrinkage but I wanted the purple mauve and it's definitely a blue.. I'll keep it but truly wishes the color was more like on the web

This sweatshirt is so thick and perfect for winter. I wear these sweatshirts nearly everyday. In comparison to more expensive brands, these hoodies are identical in look and quality. This is the most comfortable and best fit hoodie I own. I wear small normally but in sweatshirts I usually size up, but if you were to order your normal size it should fit perfect and it is stretchy. This is the best hoodie when it comes to value for money and is perfect for functionality of all!

The sleeve and edges are all frayed. Haven’t even worn it yet! Also tons of wrinkles from packaging that didn’t come out even after washing. Such a waste bc it seems the whole thing will unravel within a few washings
